mapper.insert: insert into review (review_no, training_no, trainer_no, member_id, review_title, review_content, review_good) values (#{reviewNo}, #{trainingNo}, #{trainerNo}, #{memberId}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{reviewGood})
mapper.select: select * from (select img.files_no, pro.trainer_no, li.training_no, t.training_date, t.training_starttime, t.training_status, t.member_id from member_img img inner join trainer pro on img.member_id=pro.member_id inner join linked_list li on pro.trainer_no=li.trainer_no inner join training t on li.training_no=t.training_no where member_id= #{memberId} and training_status='이용완료') where training_no = #{trainingNo}

select * from (select rownum rn, TMP.* from (select * from (select r.*, row_number() over(partition by review_no order by pet_no) as rno from review_list_view r) where rno = 1 order by review_no desc) TMP ) where rn between #{startRow} and #{endRow}
select * from (select r.*, row_number() over(partition by review_no order by pet_no) as rno from review_list_view r) where rno = 1 order by review_no desc
mapper.update: update review set review_title = #{reviewTitle}, review_content =#{reviewContent}, review_good = #{reviewGood}, review_updatetime = sysdate where review_no = #{reviewNo}
update member_img set files_no=#{filesNo} where member_id=#{memberId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from (select r.*, row_number() over(partition by review_no order by pet_no) as rno from review_list_view r) where rno = 1 order by review_no desc
